data.text: @AuriolAuriol Sorry to see @AuriolAuriol & hope for select recovery 🙏🏻
@JessHolien Yes, she is scared. Son (14) has pretty much isolated himself though.
@AuriolAuriol Hmm...Mr10 was like that. Figured a bit scared? Miss11 decided to isolate herself (negative) instead 🤣
@JessHolien She is well ventilated but unlike her usual desire to keep mum & dad out of her room, she wants company.
@AuriolAuriol Good luck! Ventilation and soap will be your new best friends. Hope 11yo stays mild... I'm sure they won't mind isolating to their room 😉🤣
@AshaRaoRMIT @AuriolAuriol Get well soon to your brave little one Dr Purdue! This is another great short video by Starship Children’s Hospital with practical advice for kids. https://t.co/D6BJQFDuY4
@AuriolAuriol Wishing speedy recovery. Hope the symptoms/effects are minimal.
@AuriolAuriol @SandhyaRamanat1 😢so sorry to hear that. She still just a baby, even if she looks so brave. This is the hardest part of this disease.

@AshaRaoRMIT @SandhyaRamanat1 Yes, I’m all stocked up and we are trying to follow the suggestions. 

Very sad little voice asked me what would happen if I got sick & would anyone come and sit with her 😕 she is such an independent soul it’s easy to forget that she is still so little.
